mapper.insert: INSERT INTO car_inout_record (company_code, license_plate_number, car_type, in_out_state, in_out_time, image_file_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{companyCode}, #{licensePlateNumber}, #{carType}, #{inOutState}, #{inOutTime}, #{imageFileId}, NOW(3), NOW(3))
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.company_code, c.license_plate_number, c.car_type, c.in_out_state, c.in_out_time, c.image_file_id, car.driver_name FROM car_inout_record c LEFT JOIN car ON car.license_plate_number = c.license_plate_number WHERE c.id = #{id} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE car_inout_record SET company_code = #{companyCode}, license_plate_number = #{licensePlateNumber}, car_type = #{carType}, in_out_state = #{inOutState}, in_out_time = #{inOutTime}, image_file_id = #{imageFileId}, updated_at = NOW(3) WHERE id = #{id}
